dt: {bc}a member of the Congregation of the Most Holy {a_link|Redeemer} founded by St. Alphonsus Liguori in Scala, Italy, in 1732 and devoted to preaching

et: French {it}rédemptoriste{/it}, from Late Latin {it}redemptor{/it} redeemer, from Latin, contractor, from {it}redimere{/it}
shortdef: a member of the Congregation of the Most Holy Redeemer founded by St. Alphonsus Liguori in Scala, Italy, in 1732 and devoted to preaching
